mapper.select: SELECT SUM(buy_cost) FROM buy_pay WHERE buy_date = #{buyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO buy_pay(buy_date, buy_app_id,buy_product_name, buy_cost, buy_click_number, buy_click_price, insert_time) VALUES
(#{item.buyDate},#{item.buyAppId},#{item.buyProductName},#{item.buyCost},#{item.buyClickNumber}, #{item.buyClickPrice},#{item.insertTime})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE buy_product_name = values(buy_product_name), buy_cost = values(buy_cost), buy_click_number = values(buy_click_number), buy_click_price = values(buy_click_price), insert_time = values(insert_time)
